DOC.brief_title: Intensity Training Cardiovascular Health Colombian Adults
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent . Interested improve health fitness . Systemic infection . Weight loss gain > 10 % body weight past 6 month reason . Currently take medication suppresses stimulate appetite . Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure 95 mm Hg treatment . Gastrointestinal disease , include selfreported chronic hepatitis cirrhosis , episode alcoholic hepatitis alcoholic pancreatitis within past year inflammatory bowel disease require treatment past year , recent significant abdominal surgery ( e.g. , gastrectomy ) . Asthma . Diagnosed diabetes ( type 1 2 ) , fast impaired glucose tolerance ( blood glucose 118 mg/dL ) , use antidiabetic medication . Currently take antidepressant , steroid , thyroid medication , unless dosage stable ( change 6 month ) . Any active use illegal illicit drug . Current exerciser ( > 30 min organize exercise per week ) . Indication unsuitability current health exercise protocol ( PARQ ) .
